 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדָה‎</span> **proper name, feminine** (***ornament***; or (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***morning***) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αδ</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">δ</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">α</span>; — wife, 

**1.** of Lamech [[Gen.4.19|Gen 4:19]]; [[Gen.4.20|Gen 4:20]]; [[Gen.4.23|Gen 4:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** of Esau [[Gen.36.2|Gen 36:2]]; [[Gen.36.4|Gen 36:4]]; [[Gen.36.10|Gen 36:10]]; [[Gen.36.12|Gen 36:12]]; [[Gen.36.16|Gen 36:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]<sup>[[BDB#R|R]]</sup>).
